stage1.description: Boshlang'ich bosqich: Oson va o'rta darajadagi savollar

questions.text: What is the past tense of the verb 'go'?
Which word is a synonym for 'happy' in the sentence: 'She was happy to see her friend'?
Fill in the blank: I ___ (be) at home yesterday.
What does the word 'book' mean in Uzbek?
Which sentence is grammatically correct?
What is the plural form of 'child'?
Choose the correct preposition: I’m good ___ English.
What does 'run out of' mean in the sentence: 'We ran out of milk'?
Which word is an antonym of 'big'?
Translate to Uzbek: 'I have two cats.'
Which word correctly completes the sentence: 'I ___ to school every day.'?
What is the meaning of the word 'house' in Uzbek?
Which sentence is grammatically correct?
What does 'take care' mean when someone says it as a goodbye?
Choose the correct article: '___ sun rises in the east.'
What is the plural form of 'apple'?

Fill in the blank: 'They ___ (not like) to watch movies.'
What does 'pick up' mean in the sentence: 'I’ll pick you up at 7 PM.'?
Translate to English: 'Men har kuni maktabga boraman.'
options: I go to school every day.
I am going to school every day.
I went to school every day.
I goes to school every day.
questions.correctAnswer: I go to school every day.

questions.text: Which word correctly completes the sentence: 'She ___ a student.'?

Fill in the blank: 'We ___ (play) football every weekend.'
What does 'look up' mean in the sentence: 'I looked up the word in the dictionary.'?
Translate to English: 'Men har kuni suzaman.'
Which word completes the sentence: 'He ___ to the park yesterday.'?
What is the meaning of 'water' in Uzbek?
Which sentence is grammatically correct?
What does 'good luck' mean when someone says it?
Choose the correct article: '___ elephant is a large animal.'
What is the plural form of 'car'?
Which word is a synonym for 'beautiful'?
Fill in the blank: 'They ___ (not go) to school on Sundays.'
What does 'find out' mean in the sentence: 'I found out the truth.'?
Translate to English: 'Men har kuni televizor ko‘raman.'
options: I am watching TV every day.
I will watch TV every day.

questions.text: Which word completes the sentence: 'I ___ a book now.'?
What is the meaning of 'school' in Uzbek?
Which sentence is grammatically correct?
What does 'take care of' mean in the sentence: 'She takes care of her plants.'?
Choose the correct article: '___ moon is bright tonight.'
What is the plural form of 'book'?
Which word is a synonym for 'happy'?
Fill in the blank: 'He ___ (like) to play chess.'
What does 'get up' mean in the sentence: 'I get up at 7 AM.'?
Translate to English: 'Men har kuni yuguraman.'

stage2.description: O'rta bosqich: O'rta va qiyin savollar

questions.text: What does the phrasal verb 'look after' mean?

What does 'to beat around the bush' mean?

options: A letter is written by her.
questions.correctAnswer: A letter is written by her.

questions.text: Translate to English: 'Men har kuni kitob o‘qiyman.'
options: I read a book every day.
I am reading a book every day.
I reading a book every day.
questions.correctAnswer: I read a book every day.

questions.correctAnswer: If I had time, I would go.

He will listen to music every day.
questions.correctAnswer: He listens to music every day.

questions.correctAnswer: If I see him, I will tell him.

questions.correctAnswer: If I knew the answer, I would tell you.

stage3.description: Final bosqich: Qiyin va ekspert darajadagi savollar

questions.text: What is the subjunctive mood in the sentence: 'If I ___ (be) you, I would study harder.'?

options: She insisted that he come early.
She insisted that he coming early.

questions.correctAnswer: She insisted that he come early.

She said that she will be tired.
questions.correctAnswer: She said that she was tired.

questions.text: Translate to Uzbek: 'The meeting has been postponed indefinitely.'
What is the difference between 'affect' and 'effect'?
options: Affect is a verb, effect is a noun.
Affect is a noun, effect is a verb.
Both are verbs with the same meaning.
Both are nouns with different meanings.
questions.correctAnswer: Affect is a verb, effect is a noun.

questions.correctAnswer: Had I known about the test, I would have studied harder.

questions.text: What is a synonym for 'meticulous'?
